headline: The Bull Case For Western Digital (WDC) Could Change Following Nasdaq‑100 Inclusion And Quantum Bet – Learn Why
summary: In recent days, Nasdaq confirmed that Western Digital will be added to the Nasdaq‑100 Index on December 22, 2025, following its earlier separation of the Flash business and renewed focus on hard disk drives and related platforms. Alongside this index inclusion, Western Digital’s investment in quantum hardware start-up Qolab and consistent earnings beats highlight its push into next‑generation computing infrastructure beyond traditional storage. We’ll now explore how Western Digital’s...
